metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Walk Idiot Walk is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Walk Idiot Walk has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Mixolydian,  and E Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
